text: Fomɨra Seban Atrivir Amizim nguazir kamɨn saghon ikegha Solomonɨn fofozir aghuimɨn akaba baraghasa ize. Ezɨ gumazir mam bar Solomon gafiragha ian tongɨn iti. Kamaghɨn, God gumazamizibar Kotim Damuamin Dughiamɨn, Seban Atrivir Amizim tugh datɨrɨghɨn itir gumazamizibar arazir kurabar gun mɨkɨmam.”
